title: Cirque Du Freak
description: Nothing will keep Darren from sneaking off to see Cirque du Freak with his friend, Steve. Between the wolf-man and the snake-boy there's lots to keep him on the edge of his seat, but it's the surprises that occur after the show that are really terrifying. To save Steve's life, Darren must make a deadly deal with the one person who can save his friendâ€¦ a deal which will alter Darren's existence forever. The first book in the compelling saga of a boy's journey into the world of vampires.
author: Darren Shan
